flavorText: "Let me unburden you of these fatuous hopes."
name: Every Dream a Nightmare
originalText: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.

rulings.text: In a Supervillain Rumble game, first the next player in turn order chooses a card in hand without revealing it, then each other opponent in turn order does the same. Then all the chosen cards are discarded simultaneously.

text: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.
